name: linked job reader
description: A job post reader for linkedin

json_schema.title: LinkedInJobPostExtractor
json_schema.description: Extracts information from LinkedIn job posts.

companyName.description: The name of the company posting the job.

datePosted.description: The date when the job was posted.

description.description: A detailed description of the job.

employmentType.description: The type of employment (e.g., Full-time, Part-time, Contract).

industry.description: The industry the job belongs to.

experienceLevel.description: The level of experience required for the job (e.g., Entry level, Associate, Mid-Senior level, Director).
